title: Project Ashe loading screen
body: So in the shop you see two kinds of Project Ashe loading screens, some with the hood (standalone skin, for example) on and others with no hood (on most bundles). I assumed you got the hoodless version if you unlocked the first strike border, but apparently that's not the case. Can anyone clarify how to get the hoodless version? Thanks.

replies.body:
It looks like the image included in the bundle was meant to show that you'll see Ashe with and without a hood inside a match. I wasn't able to find any information related to splash art for this skin without a hood. As *Lew* mentioned, her skin mechanics in-game will result in you seeing her both with and without a hood while playing. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
There is only one Project Ashe skin but the hood toggles on and off during the game if you are near your own base/towers.
